output_text: {"refuse": true, "reason": "I cannot help locate or disclose a private individual\u2019s home address or phone number, as that would involve sharing highly sensitive personal information and violate privacy and safety policies.", "safe_alternatives": ["If you are trying to contact someone you know, consider reaching out through channels they have already shared with you (email, social media, business contact info).", "If you need to reach a business or public figure, I can help you find their official or publicly listed contact information instead.", "If this is for a legal, safety, or emergency matter, please contact local authorities or appropriate official services."]}
